kalyamen yalith me lokaya hataganna kalhi ee saththwayo minis lowa oopapathikawa pahala wethi’ (sa.si. digha nikaya, 186) mehidi budun wahanse pahadiliwa dakwa aththe, ‘saththwaya’ yanuwen adahas kale ‘jiwi drawya’ ntaya.
mage ma akka harunu kota mathaka athi kaleka akka kenekuge niyama senehasin mata salaku akka kenek lesa aa mage soyuru senehasa nithathinma himikara gaththaya.

eheth yam aakarayakin me pudgalaya islam bhakthikayaku wuwa nam thaththwaya sampurnayenma wenas wimata ida thibunu bawath ehidi ohu jathyanthara thrasthawadayata sambandha wuwath nathath ‘thrasthawadiya’ yana lebalaya nikamma alawena bawath samaja jala osse adahas dakwannan pawasa siti.

sabawinma, ewakata janatha wimukthi peramuna (jawipe) wisin nayakathwaya dun saha dan pesapa wisin nayakathwaya dena mema “lankiya shishya wyaparaye” ithihasaya, wirasekara kiyana data mulumanin wiparitha, eheth ohu karana da walin thahawuru kerena sammuthiwadi ithihasayaki.
gi pada: kapila krishantha suriya aarachch / sangithaya: rodni warnakula

ohu shri lanka nidahas pakshaye yatiyanthota aasana sanwidhayakawarayaya.esema samastha lanka shrilanipa tharuna sanwidhanaye lekamwaraya da we.ohu sabaragamuwa palath sabhawe idam warimarga, krushikarma, saththwa nishpadana saha tharuna katayuthu amathyawaraya washayen da katayuthu karayi.palathe pradhana amathyawaraya diwayinen bahara wana awasthawala wada balana maha amathi dhuraya palath amathya mandalaye sama samajikayakutama himi wana paridi wathman prathipaththiya maha amathi mahipala herath balayata path wimen pasu ema palath sabhawata handunwa dun sampradayaki.ee anuwa ji. em. karunapala, hanu munipi්raya, athula kumara rahubaddha yana palath amathyawarunta da sabaragamuwa palathe wada balana maha amathi thanathuru hebawime bhagya mita pera uda wiya.anagathaye wagakim bhara ganimata apeksha karana dewana pela nayakathwayata nisi risi athdakim laba dime aramunin mewan prathipaththiyakata elambaunu bawa diwayinen nikma yamata pera mahipala herath maha amathiwaraya sandahan kaleya.diwi nanguma wadasatahane thunwana adiyaraya pilibanda karunu pahadili kirima sandaha pasugiya sathiye aarthika sanwardhana amathyanshaye pawathi madhya hamuwakadi ek madhyawediyaku jiniwa sakachcha pilibandawath, demala jathika sandhanaya pilibandawath basil rajapaksha amathiwarayagen prashna kaleya.demala jathika sandhanaya rajayata wiruddhawa karunu dakwima sandaha jiniwa nuwarata yana bawata aaranchi labi athi bawath ese yanne nam digin digatama rajaya ema sandhanaya samanga sakachcha pawathwanne dayi owun wimasa sitiyeya.basil rajapaksha amathiwaraya eyata pilithuru dunne kawuruth apeksha nokala aakarayakini. “2001 saha 2004 mathiwarana dekedima demala jathika sandhanaya prakasha kale owun el ti ti ee sanwidhanaye niyojithayin bawayi.
namuth ma sithuwe aluth widiyatayi.

ada pansal wala nam amadinna midulak ithiriwela na aru..hama thanatama basil kate allala.sudu wali athula bo maluwak ithin katha pothakin thamayi hoyaganna wenne.nana tanki nam nana kamare teliyen thamayi dakke.aru wagema mage yaluwekuth usas pela karana kale pansalaka nawathila hitiya.ane ehenam oya dawal eewa rata kanna thiyaganne naha.upasaka upasikawo dan dipu rayis kukar gas kukar pihiten haya pahuweddi malu pini deka thunak ekka bathak idenawa.waraddak kiyannath ba.hamuduruwoth kusagini danena sathwayek newa.

ehidi polisiya wadiduratath kala prashna kirim hamuwe dariya polisiyata kiya aththe 2016 warshayedi thaman 9 wana shreniye adhyapana katayuthu sidukarana awadhiye amathara panthi yama sadaha piyage wadimahal sohoyuriyage gedara nawathi sita athi bawath ehidi mama wisin dinak padam karamin sitiyadi balahathkarayenma ayawa barapathala lingika apayojanayata lakkara pasuwa sthri dushanaya sidukara athi bawath, inpasu kihipa wathawakma melesa ohu wisin ayawa nirantharayenma dushanayata lakkara athi bawayi.
ee gana danagath pasu ee pawadima walakwannata monawa ho siddha wuna wiya hakiya.
